professional_summary: Experienced Oracle Database Administrator with expertise in backup recovery, performance tuning, and high availability solutions. Skilled in designing and implementing backup strategies using RMAN, Data Pump, and conventional methods.

key_responsibilities: Administered large-scale Oracle databases for enterprise applications.
Designed and implemented backup and recovery strategies using RMAN and Data Pump.
Provided Oracle database consulting services for multiple clients.
Configured and maintained Oracle RAC environments for high availability.
Implemented Transportable Tablespace (TTS) and Flash-Back Recovery solutions.

technical_skills:
Oracle Database Administration",
            "Backup and Recovery Solutions",
            "Performance Tuning and Optimization",
            "High Availability Solutions (RAC)",
            "Data Pump, Export/Import, RMAN",
            "Flash-Back Recovery, PITR, TSPITR
tools_and_software:
Oracle SQL Developer",
            "Oracle Enterprise Manager (OEM)",

            "SQL*Loader",
            "EXP/IMP Tools",
